Posts.Content: Kathy9433 wrote: Hi ladies....just a quick question....I had my first AC treatment on 10/24/11 and right on schedule started shedding at the two week mark.  by Thursday it was mostly gone and now I have all these sad little sprigs that kind of hurt when "bent" (like a tight ponytail).  I had my second AC yesterday (11/14) and am wondering if this will take care of the stragler hairs or should I just shave it all off...this fuzzy head is definitely not a good look!  Thanks for any suggestions :O) Kathy Dx 8/17/2011, IDC, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Question about hair loss :O) Kathy9433 MaxineO

Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2011 12:54AM Kathy9433 wrote: Thanks for the advice! MizMarie...you made me laugh with the crispy hair!  And mangy is exactly the right word!  Think I will take your advice and just get rid of it! Terry 71...Thanks for the response (and also about the puffy eyes on the other thread) Thank God for make-up!  One bit of GREAT news....my 10 chin hairs have fallen out!!! Hugs and OXOXOX Kathy :O)
Posts.Title: Question about hair loss :O) Kathy9433 MaxineO

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2011 03:37PM Kathy9433 wrote: Hello Everyone!! Congratulations to all you brave ladies on finishing your treatments! YAY!!!  For me , it's 2 down 6 to go!  Thank you for the eyebrow "heads-up"!  Sounds like I should have them until Taxol and lose them shortly thereafter.  But they are already starting to thin out....with the bald head I kind of look like Casper the Friendly Ghost!  I will definitely check out the Anastasia products.... OXOXOXO to all! Kathy :O)
Posts.Title: Eyebrow and Eyelash questions?? Kathy9433 justagirl

Posts.Content: Kathy9433 wrote: Hi Everybody!  Just wondering....when will the lashes and brows be disappearing??  I am having 4 AC and 4 T treatments 3 weeks apart. (have finished the first 2 AC's)  Hair fell out right on schedule; 2 weeks after first AC.  And my other question...can anyone recommend a good eyebrow kit?  Will be going to Vegas after Thanksgiving and I know there is a Sephora store there so I might do some shopping!  Thanks for any advice.  Happy Thanksgiving to everyone!!  OXOXOXO, Kathy :O) Dx 8/17/2011, IDC, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
